item.title: 7 Children Are Killed in School Roof Collapse in India
item.description: An official in the northwestern state of Rajasthan said that heavy rain had pooled on the roof before it fell in.

item.title: Roof Collapse Kills 7 Schoolchildren in Northwestern India
item.description: A school roof fell in on Friday in Jhalawar, India, after heavy rains, killing seven children and injuring several others.

item.title: Thailand Warns of War With Cambodia as Deadly Clashes Enter 2nd Day
item.description: More than 100,000 people have been displaced in the deadliest conflict between the two nations in 14 years.

item.title: Russia Again Cuts Interest Rates as Its Economy Slows
item.description: Falling inflation has persuaded the central bank in Moscow to continue relaxing the country’s record borrowing costs.

item.title: Boeing Emerges as a Winner in Trump’s Trade Wars
item.description: Countries striking agreements with the United States have pledged to buy more Boeing planes, but it’s not clear whether those orders were the result o...
